attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: OK, he's a fantastic footballer and he and his wife have made an art of being famous, but there can't be any way that he deserves a knighthood. Please, Mr Blair, don't do it, it would make a mockery of the system.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
